name: These Cosmic Horrors are Kind of Cute?!
name_original: These Cosmic Horrors are Kind of Cute?!
description:
These Cosmic Horrors are Kind of Cute is a visual novel inspired by Lovecraftian cosmic horror. Meet some of the biggest eldritch names given human waifu form for your reading pleasure.

Premise

Kai is an ordinary convenience store worker who stumbles across an eldritch puzzle box. After he unwittingly unlocks the device, an alien god emerges from it and demands to be fed!

Note

This is a very, VERY early build of the demo. Like, a demo of the demo. You will see how early of a demo of a demo I mean with all the stock music and draft images in it. But I hope it sparks some interest! 

Credits

Spritework: https://twitter.com/rstresuta

Backgrounds: https://twitter.com/foxeleos

Graphical Assets: https://twitter.com/cafe_spaceangel (Arcticfox96)

Visual novel is made on Ren'Py
